brief_summary.textblock:
Development of a novel computer software that will assist in measuring the cup/disc ratio in
      digital stereo optic disc images.

clinical_study.brief_title: A New Reproducible Method of Measuring C/D Ratio of Digital Stereo Images of Optic Disc
condition: Developing Novel Technique of Measuring C/D Ratio From Digital Stereo Optic Disc Images

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

        Patients who attended the Glaucoma service Patients with at least one pair of documented
        digital stereo optic disc images Satisfactory Quality of image allowing Cup Disc Ratio
        Evaluation

        Exclusion Criteria:

        Unsatisfactory Quality of image allowing Cup Disc Ratio Evaluation Novel software
        technique unable to process or analyze the image

study_pop.textblock:
500 consecutive digitalized optic disc photos of 250 patients attending the Glaucoma
        Service between 1996-2012 will be extracted from a database of optic disc photos at the
        Glaucoma Service of the Ophthalmology Department, Meir Medical Center, Kfar Saba, Israel.

clinical_study.official_title: A New Reproducible Method of Measuring C/D Ratio of Digital Stereo Images of Optic Disc

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Case-Only, Time Perspective: Retrospective
